title: Return the Locket
content: ace - you can steal another person this Locket back only from Potion of Invisibility or Magic Invisibility and, after the cutscene, return it to Barth. But the "return Locker" option will be only if you speak by the person who started to speak in the first cutscene. In this dialog, you can figure out the secret of this Locket. Option №2 You don't steal back Locker. And see, just running Meli. When next time you are in Thiefling Hideout, you will be the hero there cause you helped Thiefling Meli
